page.title: 02HOUSING IN THE BLOCK.
page.content:
The total number of properties in the block used as dwellings is 13. These can be subdivided into 1) dwellings used as holiday homes and 2) those used as homes by permanent residents. The list at June 12th.1985 is as follows:
HOLIDAY HOMES -The Mains, Kirkton Cottage, Glen House and Newbigging.
RESIDENCES- Clova Hotel, 4 residents, rented; The Manse Guest House, 2 residents, owner occupied; Roineach Mhor, 5 residents, rented; Arntibber, 3 residents, tied; Caddam, 2 residents, tied; Parkhead,1 resident, owner occupied; Inchdowrie, 1 resident,owner occupied; Marchburn,1 resident, rented; Wheen Cottage,1 resident, tied.
